docs.snippet: All Times EDTFriday, May 16AUTO RACING11 a.m....
Alex Bregman and Tyler Moore each hit grand slams and drove in eight runs, and five LSU pitchers combined on a six-inning no-hitter as the Tigers routed Northwestern State 27-0 on Tuesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Alex Bregman and Tyler Moore each hit grand slams and drove in eight runs, and five LSU pitchers combined on a six-inning no-hitter as the Tigers routed Northwestern State 27-0 on Tuesday night.

headline.main: LSU Routs, No-Hits Northwestern St 27-0 in 6 Inns
headline.print_headline: LSU Routs, No-Hits Northwestern St 27-0 in 6 Inns

docs.snippet: The former labor secretary Elaine Chao will be more crucial than ever as Mitch McConnell, the Senate Republican leader, turns to face a well-funded female candidate in Kentucky....
docs.lead_paragraph: The former labor secretary Elaine Chao will be more crucial than ever as Mitch McConnell, the Senate Republican leader, turns to face a well-funded female candidate in Kentucky.
docs.abstract: Profile of Elaine L Chao, wife of Senate Republican leader Mitch McConnell; Chao is expected to play an important role as McConnell gets ready to face Democratic opponent Alison Lundergan Grimes in Kentucky in re-election fight that could render him the Senate majority leader or a retiree.

headline.main: Girding for a Fight, McConnell Enlists His Wife
headline.print_headline: Girding for a Fight, McConnell Enlists His Wife
